update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gm_create = #{gmCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gm_modified = #{gmModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
